basics.name: Hello, world!
basics.label: I'm Duygu
basics.summary: Welcome to my digital garden where I share things I'm learning and creating. All knowledge is connected in some way. The fun is in making the connections. I’m a big fan of turning things upside down to see situations from various points of view and trying to contribute solutions behind the lines of code and databases.

contactpage.name: Always happy to hear from you
contactpage.text: If you want to know more about my work or me, or if you would just like to say hello, send me a message and tell me what you have in mind. I would love to hear from you.
